introText: Topics today include AI policy and tech regulation (Meta’s new super PAC, OpenAI restrictions for under-18 users, TikTok uncertainties), major tech-platform updates and investments (Xbox PC app, Google/Apple search and Wallet features, UK AI supercomputer funding), space science funding and Mars findings (NASA budget concerns, Mars habitability clues), and global politics and conflict developments (EU-Russia oil sanctions, Gaza invasion), alongside culture, sports, and notable business news.

articles.title: Meta created its own super PAC to politically kneecap its AI rivals
articles.summary: Meta formed a political action committee to influence AI policy and public debate, aiming to counter competitors in AI ecosystems.

articles.title: The right wing is creating a society of snitches
articles.summary: Conservative actors use online harassment and high-profile firings to pressure platforms and employers to discipline critics, focusing on Charlie Kirk and moderation policy implications.

articles.title: Can Luigi Mangione get too big to jail?
articles.summary: A Verge report on Mangione’s online influence and related legal cases, examining enforcement and accountability in digital activism.

articles.title: Microsoft Xbox PC app adds Steam games and access to other stores
articles.summary: The Xbox PC app now supports Steam games and other storefronts, enabling cross-ecosystem play and broader catalog access.

articles.title: Waymo gets green light for airport service in San Francisco
articles.summary: Waymo authorized to operate its robotaxi service at San Francisco International Airport, expanding autonomous transport options.

articles.title: Microsoft trumps Google with $30 billion investment in the UK
articles.summary: Microsoft announces a $30 billion investment in the UK to develop a premier AI supercomputer and accelerate AI research.

articles.title: Apple Watch hypertension alerts cleared by FDA for new and old watches
articles.summary: FDA clearance granted for Apple Watch hypertension alerts on both new and older models.

articles.title: NASA found clues of life on Mars, but budget cuts threaten future missions
articles.summary: Mars research yielded clues about past habitability, but NASA budget cuts threaten future missions.

articles.title: Google’s Windows desktop app brings a Spotlight-like search bar to PC
articles.summary: Google’s Windows app adds a Spotlight-like search bar to access Google services from the PC.

articles.title: YouTube is inching closer to becoming a shopping channel
articles.summary: YouTube expanding monetization with AI-assisted tagging and dynamic ads to boost revenue.

articles.title: Google rolls out new Windows desktop app with Spotlight-like search tool
articles.summary: Google launches a Windows desktop app with a Spotlight-like search feature and deep integration with Google services.

articles.title: Gemini tops the App Store thanks to new AI image model, Nano Banana
articles.summary: Gemini’s Nano Banana model boosts app store rankings and usage for AI-powered imaging.

articles.title: What to know about TikTok’s uncertain future in the US and the people who want to buy it
articles.summary: Article outlines regulatory and political uncertainties around TikTok’s US status and profiles potential buyers.

articles.title: D-ID acquires Berlin-based video startup Simpleshow
articles.summary: D-ID acquires Simpleshow to combine AI video capabilities with animation tools.

articles.title: Shai-Hulud malware attack: Tinycolor and over 40 NPM packages compromised
articles.summary: Malware attack compromised Tinycolor and more than 40 npm packages.

articles.title: Scammed out of $130K via fake Google call, spoofed Google email and auth sync
articles.summary: A scam caused the loss of $130,000 through fake Google calls and spoofed emails.

articles.title: Things you can do with a Software Defined Radio (2024)
articles.summary: An article listing 50 potential uses for Software Defined Radio.

articles.title: Waymo has received our pilot permit allowing for commercial operations at SFO
articles.summary: Waymo received a pilot permit for commercial operations at San Francisco International Airport.

articles.title: Denmark close to wiping out cancer-causing HPV strains after vaccine roll-out
articles.summary: Denmark nearing eradication of cancer-causing HPV strains following vaccine rollout.

articles.title: September 15, 2025: The Day the Industry Admitted AI Subscriptions Don't Work
articles.summary: Industry acknowledges that AI subscription models do not work.

articles.title: How to make the Framework Desktop run even quieter
articles.summary: Guide on reducing noise from Framework Desktop.

articles.title: I built my own phone because innovation is sad rn [video]
articles.summary: Video about building a personal phone due to perceived innovation shortcomings.

articles.title: Irssi: IRC Client in a Docker Image
articles.summary: Irssi IRC client packaged in a Docker image.

articles.title: Plugin System
articles.summary: Overview of a plugin system.
